artist: Artist: Alexander Gorlizki; Artist: Riyaz Uddin
description: portrait of head and shoulders of a person with collage eyes and mouth; bodies of snakes wrapped loosely around head; image is created with several intricately drawn patterns in gold on black; snake bodies with intricate scale patterns in greens, blue and red; border of pink waterlilies/lotus and green leaves on gray water
signed: BR verso, graphite: \"THE CHARMER\" / Alexander Gorlizki / (Riyaz Uddin) / AG 2009; verso C, graphite: Riyaz PAPu
title: The Charmer
